info.description:
======================
Website Delivery Group
======================

.. !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
   !! This file is generated by oca-gen-addon-readme !!
   !! changes will be overwritten.                   !!
   !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

|badge1| |badge2| |badge3| |badge4| |badge5| 

Provides a way to group shipping methods on the website checkout page.

.. image:: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OCA/e-commerce/14.0/website_sale_delivery_group/static/description/website_sale_delivery_group_1.png

.. image:: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OCA/e-commerce/14.0/website_sale_delivery_group/static/description/website_sale_delivery_group_2.png

**Table of contents**

.. contents::
   :local:

Configuration
=============

Go to `Website > Configuration > eCommerce > Shipping Methods Groups`
and set up your groups.

Bug Tracker
===========

Bugs are tracked on `GitHub Issues <https://github.com/OCA/e-commerce/issues>`_.
In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported.
If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed
`feedback <https://github.com/OCA/e-commerce/issues/new?body=module:%20website_sale_delivery_group%0Aversion:%2014.0%0A%0A**Steps%20to%20reproduce**%0A-%20...%0A%0A**Current%20behavior**%0A%0A**Expected%20behavior**>`_.

Do not contact contributors directly about support or help with technical issues.
